name: Verify Progression Logic
description: Validates that game progression logic correctly enforces required steps and prevents sequence breaking.
testObjective: Ensure progression gates work properly and players cannot skip mandatory content.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has access to ship systems

steps.action: Attempt to access camera scan without viewing required training videos
steps.expected: System blocks access with appropriate message

steps.action: Try to set course to a planet without completing its report
steps.expected: System displays message: 'REPORT ON PLANET BEFORE CONTINUING'

steps.action: Complete all prerequisite steps for a planet
steps.expected: Progression gates unlock in the correct sequence

steps.action: Verify that attempting to skip mandatory content fails
steps.expected: All progression gates enforce their requirements

postconditions: Progression logic correctly enforces all requirements
Players cannot sequence break or skip mandatory content
